ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
ygData.msgSnippet: WOOOT, I am 37 , so kids to some  of you but ancient to the teenagers......lol It is nice to see non-teens playing the game and even better to see people over
ygData.messageBody:
WOOOT, I am 37 , so kids to some of you but ancient
to the teenagers......lol

It is nice to see non-teens playing the game and even
better to see people over 30.

Keep going.........



--- "Thomas H. Comegys" <tcomegys@...> wrote:
> Ah, you are just kids =)
>
> I am 57 and have been playing for over 2 years.
> Playing NWN, too.
>
> Froondor
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Orion
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Sunday, July 28, 2002 9:41 PM
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
>
>
> I just turned 48 yesterday and my wife is 40.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Steven R. Hulse
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Sunday, July 28, 2002 9:12 PM
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
>
>
> If you don't mind me asking, How old are you
> two? The reason I ask is I
> would be curious as to what some of the ages
> people are who play. Since
> you mentioned your "retired" that really got me
> to wondering. ;-)
>
> -----Original Message-----
> Message: 6
> Date: Sun, 28 Jul 2002 11:13:58 -0500
> From: "Orion" <orionv@...>
> Subject: Re: Re: bazaar
>
> My wife and I are both retired and play a lot.
> We have no life so that
> makes it even easier....:> Hey it keeps us out
> of trouble..hehehe
>
